mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.major_id AS "majorId", a.name AS "name", a.num AS "num", a.url AS "url", a.pic_url AS "picUrl", a.price AS "price", a.locknumdownpayment AS "locknumdownpayment", a.downpayment AS "downpayment", a.sellcntprepared AS "sellcntprepared", a.soldcnt AS "soldcnt", a.status AS "status", a.startdate AS "startdate", a.enddate AS "enddate", a.qq AS "qq", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO issue( id, major_id, name, num, url, pic_url, price, locknumdownpayment, downpayment, sellcntprepared, soldcnt, status, startdate, enddate, qq, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{majorId}, #{name}, #{num}, #{url}, #{picUrl}, #{price}, #{locknumdownpayment}, #{downpayment}, #{sellcntprepared}, #{soldcnt}, #{status}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{qq}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE issue SET major_id = #{majorId}, name = #{name}, num = #{num}, url = #{url}, pic_url = #{picUrl}, price = #{price}, locknumdownpayment = #{locknumdownpayment}, downpayment = #{downpayment}, sellcntprepared = #{sellcntprepared}, soldcnt = #{soldcnt}, status = #{status}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, qq = #{qq}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
